skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enhance your Smart Life with Amazon Alexa and EGLOO devices
If you own an Alexa, you can control device via Alexa

Follow the steps here to connect your EGLOO account to Amazon Alexa
1. Download the “EGLOO” app from the app store
2. Register the EGLOO account to add your devices
3. Configure your devices and name the devices
4. Download the “Amazon Alexa” app from the app store
5. Search for “EGLOO” from the skills category in the “Amazon Alexa” app
6. Enable “EGLOO” Skill, and you will be navigated to EGLOO’s login page
7. Log into your EGLOO account to finish
